name: reflect
description: Self-improvement system for Claude Code skills. Analyzes sessions, detects improvement signals, proposes skill enhancements, and tracks effectiveness metrics.
author: Claude Skills

reflect.description: Analyze session and propose skill improvements
reflect.arguments: [skill] | on | off | status | stats | validate | analyze-effectiveness | improve

reflect.description: Analyze sessions and propose improvements to skills based on corrections, successes, and edge cases

reflect-critic.description: Validates reflect proposals against 12-factor agent principles and context engineering best practices

PreToolUse.description: Suggests skill reflection before git commits

Stop.description: Captures learnings at end of session when auto-reflect is enabled

requirements.win32: Requires WSL or Git Bash for script execution
